issue.title: Change the SDF spec to make <plugin> less gazebo-specific

content.raw: Another aspect that is Gazebo-specific is the attribute `type` of the element `physics`, see a relevant discussion in [https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/541/find-custom-physics-engines/diff#comment-137379501](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/541/find-custom-physics-engines/diff#comment-137379501) .
content.html: Another aspect that is Gazebo-specific is the attribute type of the element physics, see a relevant discussion in https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/541/find-custom-physics-engines/diff#comment-137379501 .
